display_long_description:
**Turn every inch of your living room into a live-fire arena in TritonXR!**

TritonXR turns ANY space into a multiplayer mixed-reality battlefield in seconds - vault your coffee table to dodge a laser burst, lob a grenade down the hallway, or dive behind your bed to reload.

# REALITY WARFARE
[media]
Fill every inch of your room with friends, frags and frantic call-outs, and battle in either full VR or our cutting-edge XR mode - this is the world's most advanced FPS.

# FIGHT SOLO OR WITH FRIENDS
[media]
Fend off aerial hunters and furniture-climbing spiders that learn your room layout in an exciting, frantic survival mode that will leave your heart racing.

# BUILD AND BATTLE IN SECONDS
[media]
Our drop-dead-simple XR map editor snaps walls, props and more straight onto your floor plan. Carve cover, raise vantage platforms, or spawn weapon caches with easy-to-use tools.

**This is the world's most advanced FPS. Are you ready?**
